CABINET of ROMAN
and other GOINS and MEDALS,
In GOLD, SILVER and BRASS,
Confign'd from ABROAD ;
Many of which are in finePrcfervatio7i:
To WHICH IS ADDED*
A Series of English Silver,
And a fmall Collection of
CAMEOS and INTAGLiAS, Set in RINGS:
ALSO,
An elegant Medal Cabinet ;
Which will be SOLD by AUCTION,
By Samuel Paterfon,
At EJfex Houfe, in Ejjex Street, Strand.,
On WEDNESDAY and THURSDAY,the 16th
and 17th of "January, 1771,
To begin each Day precifely at Twelve o'CIock.
To be viewed on Monday the 14th Infrant, and to
the d ime of Sale.
Catalogues may be had Gratis at Ejfx Houfe aforefaid.
f
/»
Conditions of Sale.
L ^PHE highed Bidder is to be the Buyer ;
**" and if any Difpute (hail arife between Two
or more Bidders, the Lot fhall be put up again.
IL No Perfon fhall advance Lefs than Six pence;
above a Pound, One Shilling
*,
above Five
Pounds, Two Shillings and Six-pence.
III. Every Purchafer is to pay down Five Shillings
in the Pound, as Earned, and to give in his
Name and Place of Abode (if required)
..
I
IV. The Lots are to be taken away with all Faults,
at the Buyer's Expence, within two Days after
the Sale; and the Remainder of the Purchafe Money to be abiblutely paid on the Delivery;
in Default of which, the Earned will become
forfeited, the Lots refold, and the Deficiencies,
(if any) mud be made good by the former
Purchasers.
